solution_line_template: That means he has written {books_per_year}*{writing_years}=<<{books_per_year}*{writing_years}={total_books_written}>>{total_books_written} books
So he has made {total_books_written}*{earnings_per_book}=$<<{total_books_written}*{earnings_per_book}={total_money_made}>>{total_money_made} from writing
